CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISBLANK(Activate_Application_Date__c), ISBLANK(End_Application_Date__c)), "Inactive", IF( Activate_Application_Date__c <= TODAY() && End_Application_Date__c >= TODAY(), "Active", "Inactive") )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: "Active" if this record is currently causing the application to be open. "Inactive" otherwise.
CustomField.label: Application Status
